entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
